이젠 모르겠어요....

The game is buggy as shit, the killers always have the advantage and its never balanced for the survivors in any way at all. Instead they keep nerfing items the survivors get to make them even weaker and pretty much useless. they keep buffing killer perks and making them pretty much unstoppable and the ranking system is trash. you will never get a fair match at all. you will either win really really easily because the killer is new to the game or you will end up fighting someone that is way higher level with no hope of winning. also there is no reward for getting to rank 1 so the ranking system is also pointless because you don't gain anything from it. Buying characters with the in currency  is pretty much impossible unless you start maxing the starting characters out. as an explain, any of the free characters you can get up to level 50. doing so will get you somewhere around 4k points. to even buy 1 new person (and most of them you cant even by with the in game currency unless you pay real money. around 5$ per characters) you would need to max out 2 free characters and then start on another one and get that one up to about 15ish to 20ish to buy 1 of there characters. This is really kinda pointless and makes you spend so much time trying to grind the shards out it becomes more of a chore then anything else. so unless you want to spend 5$ on every survivor and killer then you will need to grind a very long time. I think the game could use some love as it seems the devs care more about how they feel about the game then keeping it fair and balanced for anyone else. only positive note to take from this is some of the killers are really sweet and one of the starting survivors is Bill from Left4Dead. Overall if the game was more balanced i think this would be a great game. I only play with my friends and refuse to play it by myself unless i am the killer myself because of how broken they are. I can easily kill everyone and i barely know what i am doing as a killer. but some how i still do it. Not a game i would recommend unless you like  throwing your computer out the window. Great game if you're looking for an unfair advantage as the killer though.

Si quieres entrenarte en las grandes artes del "camping" aquí podrás entrentarte. Se ve que en este juego solo se trata de eso (Al menos siendo el Asesino), En cuanto agarran a alguien, simplemente esperar a que los demás ayuden a su compañero y ya ganaste como asesino. Aparte de que no los puedes reportar por eso por que disque es "Legal" hacer eso... 

En fin, todo lo demás del juego está bastante bien, te mete mucho en el juego, la música muy bien lograda, los personajes bien hechos, eso sí, debes jugarlo mucho para obtener las mejores habilidades para tu "Superviviente ó "Asesino" favorito.

这游戏BUG层出不穷，官方发布外挂，飞天遁地无所不能。10把游戏9把保存游戏失败，官方教刷血点，且不会升段位。19段血脸，血衣加血裤，哈哈举报还没有用。
黎明杀机这款游戏除了有时候会段位更新错误，初始化错误，社交功能不可用，无法连接到网络外，这个游戏还是可以卡BUG的，比如裂空卡柜子啊，比如被队友炸成永久瞎子啊，其他方面都还是挺好的，屠夫很善良，把你挂在树上怕你孤独还在树下陪你，多孝顺啊。你被队友救下来还继续追你把你继续挂在树上。嗯，真香

Good game, a lot of nuance to learn. Very fun with friends, and very fun solo playing killer. 

You level up and progress (albeit quite slowly) whether you 'win' or 'lose' a match, however I have heard this game will pop blood vessels if you are a competitive player or someone who is easily tilted. I can verify as I have already been given hate on my steam profile within my first couple of matches.

游戏机制不错，画质差，游戏设定较压抑，野人队友多半都是自顾自己或者是送头，所以投入过多时间进行游戏很无聊。作为休闲游戏偶尔耍耍挺好

Her şey güzel hoş da, koca 2 saat içerisinde 2 maç atabildim be arkadaş bu ne eşleştirme süresi böyle?!?!?  Önce killer seçip arattım bulmadı. Hadi dedim killer daha çok talep edildiğinden bulamamıştır survivor oynayım bari dedim, o da yok. Uzun bekleme süresi sayesinde beni bezdirdi oyun. Hevesli bir şekilde indirip açtım ama maç beklemek çok uzun sürüyor. Zaten tek başıma oynayacaktım sıkıldığım zamanlarda değişiklik olsun diye. Böyle maç bekleyerek daha çok sıkılırım ben. O yüzden iade istedim. Arkadaşlarınızda varsa bu sıkıntıyla uğraşmadan keyifli vakitler geçirebilirsiniz. Ama tek başına oynayacak kişilerdenseniz benim gibi siz de bayarsınız beklemekten.
